item.title: W3C (@w3c@w3c.social) on Twitter: "See Coralie Mercier's blog post: "On the surface, the new site implements current web best practices, donned a cleaner and elegant visual design, and provides information in a more user-friendly fashion. Under the hood, everything changed " / Twitter

item.title: NASA Webb Telescope on Twitter: "Cosmic meet-cute 🌹 500 million years ago, 2 massive spiral galaxies collided. Their clouds of gas & dust mingled like smoke, sparking a burst of star formation. This event created galaxy NGC 3256. Its baby stars shine in infrared light, Webb’s specialty: " / Twitt
item.description: NASA Webb Telescope on Twitter: "Cosmic meet-cute 🌹 500 million years ago, 2 massive spiral galaxies collided. Their clouds of gas & dust mingled like smoke, sparking a burst of star formation. This event created galaxy NGC 3256. Its baby stars shine in infrared light, Webb’s specialty: https://t.co/88TiRqgGDC https://t.co/GcUJPRyaEj" / Twitter https://twitter.com/NASAWebb/status/1675867254234259458

item.title: Chandra Observatory on Twitter: "Today Chandra is studying a galaxy in Coma Berenices. Nearby in the sky is galaxy NGC 4907, located about 270 million light-years from Earth. The star shining brightly beneath NGC 4907 looks so big because it's ~100,000 times closer to Earth — a mere 2,500 light-year
item.description: Chandra Observatory on Twitter: "Today Chandra is studying a galaxy in Coma Berenices. Nearby in the sky is galaxy NGC 4907, located about 270 million light-years from Earth. The star shining brightly beneath NGC 4907 looks so big because it's ~100,000 times closer to Earth - a mere 2,500 light-years away. https://t.co/u8FnXl42o9" / Twitter https://twitter.com/chandraxray/status/1672264910435389441

item.title: NASA Webb Telescope on Twitter: "You're looking at 45,000+ galaxies. This image was taken as part of the JWST Advanced Deep Extragalactic Survey (JADES) — a massive science program that’s revolutionizing what we know about galaxies in the early universe: Here are the highlights ⬇️ " / Twitter
item.description: NASA Webb Telescope on Twitter: "You're looking at 45,000+ galaxies. This image was taken as part of the JWST Advanced Deep Extragalactic Survey (JADES) - a massive science program that’s revolutionizing what we know about galaxies in the early universe: https://t.co/5gqntO0C4S Here are the highlights ⬇ https://t.co/8VqYlmvtDK" / Twitter https://twitter.com/NASAWebb/status/1665755317198544897
